title: Peter Berg & Buzz Bissinger: "Friday Night Lights"
description: Michael's conversation with Buzz Bizzinger, author of "Friday Night Lights" and Peter Berg, director of the movie by the same title. This aired on WPHT on 1 October 2004, one week before the movie was released. Michael's late father was also a part of this conversation, one not to miss.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Walter Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi, Peter Berg, Buzz Bissinger)
